name: Gragon Gillers
description:
The only redeeming thing about this entire project is that it was developed in 1 week, by a dumbass high school student so enjoy. There were several assets used from the Unity Asset Store because I am a one-man army and have no artistic talent. Was a great learning experience, will be doing future jams with less shitty content. Have a good day.

You got a wizard, an archer, a warrior, WASD movement, and a jump.
Wizard does fireball, the archer shoots at the cursor, and the warrior does damage and knockback for mob control.
